parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: ConsumerAppIds
parameters.description: The ID of the custom application.

parameters.name: DubboMockItems
parameters.description: The items in the recycle bin.

parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the alert rule. Valid values:

*   `true`: enables the alert rule.
*   `false`: disables the alert rule.

parameters.name: MockType
parameters.description:
The response time (RT) threshold of slow calls. Valid values:

*   \- 15: 15 ms
*   \- 30: 30 ms
*   \- 60: 60 ms
*   \- 120: 120 ms

parameters.name: ProviderAppId
parameters.description: The ID of the service provider application.

parameters.name: ProviderAppName
parameters.description: The name of the service provider application.

parameters.name: ScMockItems
parameters.description: The input parameters. The JSON format is supported.
